name: reselect

scripts.compile: babel -d lib/ src/

scripts.compile:umd: mkdir -p dist/ && babel --loose es6.modules --modules umd --module-id Reselect -o dist/reselect.js src/
scripts.prepublish: npm run compile && npm run compile:umd
